alert.note: Alert for North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 7:49PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Elbert and northeastern Lincoln Counties through 830 PM MDT... At 748 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Agate, or 13 miles northwest of Limon, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Limon, Hugo and Genoa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for east central Colorado.

area.areaDesc: North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County
